item.title: Cerca : Search a website's links
item.description: Overview I recently had a problem where I wanted to verify that a website: did not link to a given website on a blacklist did not return non 2XX status codes for a given route Although there are many utilities you can probably piece together to solve this problem, I decided to make my own utility Cerca (which is Catalan for search). Problem Given a website URL, search the website for all external and internal links.
